member.name: CLAIM_SECURITY_ATTRIBUTE_RELATIVE_V1
member.summary: The CLAIM_SECURITY_ATTRIBUTE_RELATIVE_V1 structure defines a resource attribute that is defined in continuous memory for persistence within a serialized security descriptor.

member.name: CLAIM_SECURITY_ATTRIBUTE_RELATIVE_V1.Name
member.summary: A value that indicates an offset from the beginning of the CLAIM_SECURITY_ATTRIBUTE_RELATIVE_V1 structure to a string of Unicode characters that contain the name of the claim security attribute. The string must be at least 4 bytes in length.

summary.para: A union tag value that indicates the type of information being referred to by the Values member. The Values member will contain an array of offsets from the beginning of the CLAIM_SECURITY_ATTRIBUTE_RELATIVE_V1 structure to each value. The ValueType member must be one of the following values.

listheader.description: The Values member refers to an array of offsets to LONG64 values.
The Values member refers to an array of offsets to ULONG64 values.
The Values member refers to an array of offsets to Unicode character string values.
The Values member refers to an array of values.

member.name: CLAIM_SECURITY_ATTRIBUTE_RELATIVE_V1.Reserved
member.summary: This member is currently reserved and must be set to zero when sent and must be ignored when received.

summary.para: The claim security attribute flags must be zero or a combination of one or more of the following values.

listheader.description: This claim security attribute is not inherited across processes.
The value of the claim security attribute is case sensitive. This flag is valid for values that contain string types.
The claim security attribute is considered only for deny access control entries (ACEs).
The claim security attribute is disabled by default.
The claim security attribute is disabled.
The claim security attribute is mandatory.

member.name: CLAIM_SECURITY_ATTRIBUTE_RELATIVE_V1.ValueCount
member.summary: The number of values contained in the Values member.

member.name: CLAIM_SECURITY_ATTRIBUTE_RELATIVE_V1.Values
member.summary: An array of offsets from the beginning of the CLAIM_SECURITY_ATTRIBUTE_RELATIVE_V1 structure. Each offset indicates the location of a claim security attribute value of the type specified in the ValueType member.

member.name: CLAIM_SECURITY_ATTRIBUTE_RELATIVE_V1.Values.pInt64
member.summary: Pointer to an array of ValueCount members that is an offset from the beginning of the structure to a LONG64 of type CLAIM_SECURITY_ATTRIBUTE_TYPE_INT64.

member.name: CLAIM_SECURITY_ATTRIBUTE_RELATIVE_V1.Values.pUint64
member.summary: Pointer to an array of ValueCount members where each member is an offset from the beginning of the structure to a ULONG64 of type CLAIM_SECURITY_ATTRIBUTE_TYPE_UINT64.

member.name: CLAIM_SECURITY_ATTRIBUTE_RELATIVE_V1.Values.ppString
member.summary: Pointer to an array of ValueCount members where each member is an offset from the beginning of the structure to a PWSTR of type CLAIM_SECURITY_ATTRIBUTE_TYPE_STRING.

member.name: CLAIM_SECURITY_ATTRIBUTE_RELATIVE_V1.Values.pFqbn
member.summary: Pointer to an array of ValueCount members where each member is an offset from the beginning of the structure to the fully qualified binary name value of type .

member.name: CLAIM_SECURITY_ATTRIBUTE_RELATIVE_V1.Values.pOctetString
member.summary: Pointer to an array of ValueCount members where each member is an offset from the beginning of the structure to a LONG64 octet string of type .
